snippet: Despite slow economic growth in the first three months of the year, there were gains in both the industrial and retail sectors in March, according to new data.
abstract: China's economic growth slowed sharply in the first three months of the year, but efforts by policy makers to jump-start the economy appear to be working, with industrial and retail activity both rising during March; nation's economy expanded 8.1 percent compared to a year earlier.
lead_paragraph: Despite slow economic growth in the first three months of the year, there were gains in both the industrial and retail sectors in March, according to new data.

headline.main: Slow First Quarter in China, but Recent Signs of Growth
headline.print_headline: Slow First Quarter in China, But Recent Signs of Growth
